column1: # Each field can contain alphanumeric characters and hyphens (-) only
# server-name  - This must be unique and it must match the name used in the
#                data directory path for uploaded files.
# node-name    - This must be unique for a given server and it must match the name
#                used in the data directory path for uploaded files.
# node-group   - This is used in the node grouping tabs in the Hedgehog front end.
#                It should be unique for a given server. It is optional and if not
#                specified the node is added to a group called 'Other'.
# node-subgroup - This is used to collect nodes into subgroups for convenient
#                 selection and plotting. It should be unique for a given group.
#                 It is optional and if not specified is left blank.
